subject: Davis Cup
Tennis
lead_paragraph: If Philipp Petzschner, Jérémy Chardy and Mikhail Kukushkin do not spark recognition, it may be because you are not a hard-core tennis fan. All three were impressive on Sunday.
snippet: If Philipp Petzschner, Jérémy Chardy and Mikhail Kukushkin do not spark recognition, it may be because you are not a hard-core tennis fan. All three were impressive on Sunday.
